roleset.name: (cause to) move in \/\/\/ fashion

example.name: I'll zag
example.text: It's been zigging and zagging between green and red.

roleset.note: frame by Perryn. VN class actually for zigzag-- not just zag in itself. But still helpful.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'zag' based on sentences in brown.
